title: Erigon won't run using a previously downloaded database
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: ./build/bin/erigon --version
erigon version 2022.99.99-dev-d866b119

OS & Version: Linux Ubuntu Server 22.04

Commit hash : d866b119236c9b93ca071abc0e45526cf82b58d7

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon runs using a datadir which was previously synced

#### Actual behaviour
Erigon crashes with stack overflow

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
/software/erigon/build/bin/erigon --datadir=/data/erigon_mainnet --chain=mainnet --http --ws --http.addr=0.0.0.0

where /data/erigon_mainnet is a previously synced chain state

Now I get the slightly more verbose error message:
```
WARN[08-10|21:34:05.912] [snapshots] open segment                 err="invalid snapshot format. decompress.buildPatternTable faced maxDepth underflow, fileName: v1-005000-005500-transac
tions.seg"
```

But ultimately it's the same crash.

Moving the problem file out of the directory looks like it might have fixed the problem... I'm now back to downloading snapshots.

I'll leave this open, because something has clearly gone wrong. I can make the file that was causing my node to panic available to download if you'd like.
